title: Host a Parallel Event, CSW 60
desc: The NGO Committee on the Status of Women, NY (NGO CSW/NY) organizes an NGO CSW Forum that includes an NGO CSW Forum Consultation Day, Reception, and NGO CSW Forum Parallel Events during the annual UN Commission on the Status of Women (CSW) meeting in New York. NGO CSW Forum Parallel Events will be held from 14-24 March 2016. The last day to apply for Parallel Events is 11 December 2015. This year we are offering our members an early bird discount of $10 off both Consultation Day and the Reception!? Sign-up for membership  between November 16th and November 30th and you will receive your discount code on December 1st. FAQs What is the refund policy? If we are able to schedule your event, you will receive your assigned date and time on 11 January 2016. If we are unable to schedule your event, you will receive a full refund. Events that ar cancelled by the organizer cannot be refunded.
